Package com.example.team29project.Controller

Class DatabaseController

java.lang.Object
com.example.team29project.Controller.DatabaseController
public class DatabaseController extends Object
This class controllers actions regarding to database.

    • sort

      public void sort(String sortBy, boolean isAsc, SortItemCallback callback)
      Sort the list by sortBy
      Parameters:
      sortBy - string that is the standard of sorting
      isAsc - boolean value whether it is ascending or descending
      callback - SortItemCallback instances for dealing after sorting
